snippet: The state is offering a $100,000 reward for information leading to the capture of the inmates, or $50,000 for tips leading to each one.
abstract: Police continue to hunt for murderers Richard Matt and David Sweat, who escaped from Clinton Correctional Facility in Dannemora, NY, by using power tools to cut their way out of facility; Gov Andrew M Cuomo announces state is offering $100,000 reward for information leading to capture of inmates.

byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and ASHLEY SOUTHALL
byline.contributor: Jesse McKinley reported from Dannemora, N.Y., and Ashley Southhall from New York. J. David Goodman and Benjamin Mueller contributed reporting. Jack Begg contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The state is offering a $100,000 reward for information leading to the capture of the inmates, or $50,000 for tips leading to each one.

headline.main: With Power Tools and a Ruse, 2 Killers Flee New York Prison
headline.print_headline: With Power Tools and a Ruse, 2 Killers Flee New York Prison
